{{Quote|Halt! Halt!|The Watchman|Mhysa}}AÂ '''Night's Watchman''' is a character who appears in the [[Season 3|third season]] episode "[[Mhysa]]". He is played by [[Will O'Connell]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
He alerts other members of the Watch of [[Jon Snow]]'s return.
